actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to permit certain voluntary military service to be counted toward the years-of-service requirement for benefits under such act.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to permit certain periods of voluntary military service to be counted towards the "years of service" requirement for eligibility for benefits under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to permit certain voluntary military service to be counted toward the years-of-service requirement for benefits under such act.
